name: strapi-5-next-js-15-crash-course
description: Example of using Strapi 5 with Next.js 15

scripts.setup: yarn install && yarn setup:client && yarn setup:server
scripts.dev: yarn concurrently "cd server && yarn develop" "npx wait-on http://localhost:1337 && cd client && yarn dev"
scripts.repo:upstream: git fetch upstream && git merge upstream/main
